text: Virtual XI is an album by Iron Maiden. It is their eleventh studio album. The album was released on 23 March 1998. It was not liked by reviewers. One person who reviewed it said that it sounded "lifeless" and "tired." ==Musicians== * Blaze Bayley - lead vocals * Dave Murray - guitar * Janick Gers - guitar * Steve Harris - bass guitar, keyboards * Nicko McBrain - drums * Michael Kenneyâ€“ keyboards ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1998 albums Category:Iron Maiden albums
title: Virtual XI
